name: DeFido
description: What is DeFido? DeFido was built on the Binance Smart Chain as a meme cryptocurrency. More specifically, it is a hyper-deflationary sub coin with a smart sharing system built into the ecosystem, so each investor receives more DeFido in their wallet just for holding. There is a redistribution transfer for every buy/sell, 8% commission fee is charged and distributed, 4% to holders and the other 4% is added to the marketing wallet for project development.
